item.description: The justices' decision has the potential to affect everything from prices at the grocery store to mortgage rates and the labor market.

item.title: Proposed New FDIC Limits Could Protect More of Your Money From Bank Failures
item.description: Officials from both parties are pushing to raise the FDIC insurance limit from $250,000 to $10 million. But not only millionaires would benefit.
